name: postcss-remove-root

author: cbracco

name: cq-prolyfill
description: Adds support for CSS container queries (aka element query) like `:container(width > 100px)`.
author: ausi

name: postcss-flexbox
description: that provides an easy to use option for using CSS3 Flexbox layouts.
author: archana-s

name: postcss-mq-optimize
description: removes invalid media queries or its expressions
author: panec

name: postcss-polish-stylesheets
description: Polish Style Sheets
author: emero

name: postcss-calc-function
description: to resolve the CSS calc function
author: colinmeinke

name: postcss-custom-props
description: to enable CSS Custom Properties
author: colinmeinke

name: postcss-filter-stream
description: which allows you to blacklist files / folders that you don't want to process with a given PostCSS plugin.
author: tsm91

name: postcss-font-normalize
description: to normalize font, especially font-family.
author: iahu

name: postcss-lang-optimizer
description: Extract language specific CSS rulesets to their own CSS files to optimize stylesheet delivery.
author: chriseppstein

name: css-declaration-sorter
description: Sort CSS declarations fast and automatically in a certain order.
author: Siilwyn

name: postcss-speech-bubble
description: creates different kinds of speech bubbles and popovers with just a couple of lines of CSS
author: archana-s

name: postcss-define-units
description: define any custom units
author: LestaD

name: postcss-font-awesome
description: plugin to pull in a Font Awesome's icon unicode using content.
author: dan-gamble

name: postcss-rtlcss-combined
description: PostCSS plugin that creates a combined LTR/RTL stylesheet. Powered by rtlcss.
author: rtsao

name: postcss-if-media
description: A PostCSS plugin to inline or nest media queries within CSS rules & properties.
author: arccoza

name: postcss-aspect-ratio
description: A PostCSS plugin to fix an element's dimensions to an aspect ratio.
author: arccoza

name: postcss-vertical-rhythm-function
description: adds a vertical rhythm `vr()` function
author: F21

name: postcss-gradient-transparency-fix
description: transforms `transparent` values in gradients to support Safari's different color interpolation.
author: gilmoreorless

name: postcss-oldschool-grid
description: grid system with wrapping columns and padding as gutters
author: lordgiotto

name: postcss-clean
description: to minify CSS with clean-css
author: leodido

name: postcss-choose-color
description: Plugin that choose foreground color based on the background brightness
author: hexpanic

name: postcss-pure-grid
description: that allows you to use purecss grid system
author: axvm

name: postcss-emptymediaqueries
description: removes empty media queries
author: OctoD

name: postcss-csso
description: PostCSS plugin to minify CSS using CSSO
author: lahmatiy

name: postcss-attribute-selector-prefix
description: adds a prefix to attribute selectors
author: GitScrum

name: postcss-em-media-query
description: PostCSS plugin for transforming min/max-width/height media queries to ems.
author: niksy

name: postcss-media-query-gap
description: PostCSS plugin for applying gap on max-width/height media queries.
author: niksy

name: postcss-theme
description: that allows easy theming.
author: andywer

name: usedcss
description: Extract only styles presented in your HTML files.
author: komachi

name: postcss-property-shorthand
description: for short definition of user default properties using variables
author: alanev

name: postcss-get-color
description: to get the prominent color from an image with Vibrant.js.
author: ismamz

name: postcss-remove-classes
description: that removes all instances of class names from your CSS
author: jacobp100

name: postcss-flexbox-unboxer
description: that removes display: box from your stylesheets.
author: Chapabu

name: postcss-magic-animations
description: PostCSS plugin that adds @keyframes from Magic Animations
author: nucliweb

name: postcss-discard-overridden
description: PostCSS plugin to discard overridden @keyframes or @counter-style.
author: Justineo

name: es-css-modules
description: that combines CSS Modules with ES6 import/export syntax
author: jacobp100

name: postcss-display-inline-blcok
description: PostCSS plugin to add display:inline-block hacker for IE8.
author: aemoe

name: postcss-bgimage
description: removes background-image properties with url() values or leaves only its. It allows to separate your layouts CSS from the images CSS to boost speed showing of page.
author: ahtohbi4

name: postcss-inline-media
description: that allow you to inline media queries in properties
author: dimitrinicolas

name: postcss-high-contrast
description: Create high contrast version of your project with ease
author: admdh

name: postcss-less-parser
description: Parses and evaluates LESS to CSS (using true Less.js)
author: Crunch

name: postcss-invert-keyframes
description: PostCss plugin that takes a keyframe animation and duplicates it, with a reversed or mirror version. This creates a reverse of the given keyframe animation.
author: jpgorman

name: postcss-responsive-values
description: that automatically adds media queries for targetted values.
author: troch

name: postcss-fixes
description: PostCSS plugin pack to fix known browser bugs and implement fallbacks.
author: MattDiMu

name: postcss-pie
description: makes IE several of the most useful CSS3 decoration features
author: gucong3000
